jobDescription: trustaff is currently seeking an experienced Dialysis Registered Nurse for a 13-week travel contract.  Dialysis RNs provide care and support for patients suffering from acute and chronic renal failure. Dialysis nurses are experts in hemodialysis and peritoneal dialysis and assist before, during, and after dialysis procedures.  1+ year of recent Dialysis RN experience is required **Most travel contracts include:13-week contractsMultiple Shifts Available; Days & NightsGuaranteed Hours
